details: Help support the Design Showcase and Project Kick-Off ($1,500 or more)
Sponsor a Senior Capstone Design project ($3,500)
Provide unrestricted gifts for materials, equipment, and/or supplies used in the Bernard F. Gordon Learning Factory or in any of the departmental facilities (typically $5,000+)
Donate materials and equipment directly for use in the Bernard M. Gordon Learning Factory or in any of the departmental facilities
Donate your time and energy by becoming part of our Industry Advisory Board
headings: There are numerous ways to get involved with the Learning Factory as a corporate sponsor:

Corporate sponsors receive brand exposure and recognition on Learning Factory materials, such as the website and brochures. Also, corporate sponsors may provide signage for display in our facilities and at our events.
